description: Learn to make fragrant beef pho in a slow-cooker with this recipe. Set and forget your slow-cooker, then come back to discover a pho that will tantalise the senses.
name: Slow-Cooked Beef Pho Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook noodles according to packet instructions. Drain. Divide noodles and beef among bowls. Ladle over broth. Top with sprouts, chilli, coriander and mint. Serve with lemon wedges.
